snippet: To prevent drownings, Russian cities drained public fountains on the soldiers’ national holiday.
abstract: Russian city governments drain water from municipal fountains, hoping to keep drunken paratroopers from drowning in them as the soldiers celebrate Paratrooper Day, their national holiday.
lead_paragraph: To prevent drownings, Russian cities drained public fountains on the soldiers’ national holiday.

headline.seo: Russia Drains Fountains for Paratrooper Day
headline.main: Russia Pulls the Plug on Drunken Paratroopers’ Swimming Pool of Choice
headline.print_headline: Russia Pulls the Plug on Drunken Paratroopers’ Swimming Pool of Choice
